infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to take photos during check-in and incident reporting.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires location access to verify your check-in location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires location access to track patrol routes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires photo library access to upload evidence for incidents.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Security Guard App to access your camera for check-in verification and incident reporting.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Security Guard App to use your location for attendance verification.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Security Guard App to access your photos for uploading incident evidence.
